                    - There are different types of treatment for patients with chronic myelogenous leukemia.     - Six types of standard treatment are used:         - Targeted therapy     - Chemotherapy      - Biologic therapy     - High-dose chemotherapy with stem cell transplant      - Donor lymphocyte infusion (DLI)     - Surgery         - New types of treatment are being tested in clinical trials.     - Patients may want to thi
